publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1550.3 Stewart Maxwell: Fuel Poverty—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1550) in the name of Liam McArthur, leave out from "calls on the Scottish Government" to end and insert "recognises the Scottish Government’s announcement on the consultation to remove planning restrictions on the wide range of energy generating and saving devices, and calls on the Scottish Government to make a statement to the Parliament before the summer recess outlining in detail its progress to more effectively address fuel poverty." Supported by: Nicola Sturgeon*
